# load()

**Instance Method**

Atomically loads and returns the current value of this reference.

## Declaration

```swift
func load() -> Instance?
```

## Return Value

A value of `Instance` if the lazy reference was written to, or `nil` if it has not been written to yet.

## Discussion
title: load()
